attributes.background: We are all stuck up in the busy life of earning and learning to feed ourselves and others. During this we become exhausted and when the bank holidays come around we are relieved and able to restore or mental state which is a necessity for a healthy life.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure how many new bank holidays you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
